attributes.action: provide funds to developing countries so that they can build environmentally sustainable factories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the developed countries such as Britain have donated or sold old and unenvironmentally-friendly factories to LEDCs, and we are now demanding that they reduce carbon emissions in their industry, we petition the Prime Minister to provide specific funding to these countries, especially those in the Commonwealth. The funding would be used in order to build environmentally sustainable factories, providing good working environments and low CO2 emissions.
